morphInfos.tenseExplained: it has happened in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.caseExplained: being done for them or relating to them
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are male or take a masculine form

morphInfos.description: give to men that _have done themselves_ good
